The signed documents serve to the development of various aspects of our cooperation.
France is Europe's leading state and France has a special place and role in the development of relations between Azerbaijan and the European Union.
Azerbaijan is the first trade partner of France in the South Caucasus.
Our trade turnover is about $ 2 billion. This figure will increase as a result of the agreements reached.
Azerbaijan is in the first place for the volume of direct foreign investments in the post-Soviet space.
Over $ 150 billion has been invested in the country's economy over the past decade.
Last year, more than $ 25 billion was invested. 30 percent of them are foreign investment.
I have great confidence in the long-term successful development of Azerbaijan.
Because the steps taken in the development of our country in recent years have led to concrete results.
Azerbaijani population, citizens see the advantages of independence in daily life.
Private Sector Development, Attraction of Foreign Investments, At the same time, Public Investment in the Country (cont) http://t.co/JeOqUqSoBT
Azerbaijan is the initiator of construction of all the oil and gas pipelines going from the Caspian Sea to the West (cont) http://t.co/oKOWAhtaxE
The contract of the XXI century was signed last year. It consists of three components: extraction, transportation and sales.

This project, together with Azerbaijan, Turkey and Georgia, connects Asia with Europe.

France, as co-chair of the OSCE Minsk Group, strives to resolve the Armenian-Azerbaijani Nagorno-Karabakh conflict.
We hope that this conflict will soon be solved with the help of mediators and peace in the region will come.
For many years, the Azerbaijani lands, Nagorno-Karabakh and seven surrounding districts have been occupied by Armenian occupation.
All respected international organizations have expressed their position on this issue. This conflict should be stopped soon.
The conflict should be solved on the basis of the norms and principles of international law within the territorial integrity of Azerbaijan.
The principle of self-determination of peoples should not violate the borders of countries recognized by the international community.
The Armenian people have already set their own self-determination - an independent Armenian state.
Azerbaijan will never allow the creation of a second Armenian state on its territory.
Azerbaijan strives for Europe's energy security.
Documents signed last year will bring Azerbaijani gas to Europe and I am sure (cont) http://t.co/Ic2x7U2Keg
Shah Deniz, Trans-Anatolia and Trans-Adriatic projects are Europe's largest infrastructure projects. This is (cont) http://t.co/IS6g7rgJrd
No outside influence can affect our external or internal policies.
Azerbaijan is an independent state, prevails its independence and uses its independence independently.
We are reforming the economic and political spheres. Political reforms are as important to us as economic reforms.

All fundamental freedoms are ensured - freedom of speech, freedom of conscience, freedom of the press, freedom of assembly.

We are visiting Beijing to attend the celebration celebrating the 60th anniversary of the establishment of the Chinese People's Friendship Friendship Association. Yesterday, I met with Lee Kobayashi, the association at the association, and said that they would like to cooperate with each other so that both Japan and China will be able to welcome the day when plum and cherry blossoms are in full bloom as soon as possible. For details click here → http: // t.co / tKCEkQenQD

We met with Xi Jinping Jintao Friendship Hall Chairman other along with the in Satsuki Eda date prior to the ceremony. After that, the Chinese People's External Friendship Association was established 60 anniversary ceremony held at the Great Hall of the People golden hall, a large number of dignitaries, including Xi Jinping Jintao from the Chinese side also, 24 people dignitaries from 18 countries We attended the guests including.
At the ceremony, six guests from overseas gave greetings on behalf of each country and region, and I also made a speech. For details, click here → http: // t.co / dX8ESCRtZC

My press point with Prime Minister of #Moldova @IurieLeanca will start shortly, watch live here: http://t.co/wu0IqZW3aK
Today's meeting is a testimony of excellent EU-Moldovan relations & a concrete sign of our commitment to modern, united & stable #Moldova.
We have confirmed our joint willingness to open up a new chapter of bilateral relations by signing on 27 June the #AssociationAgreement
PM @IurieLeanca & I also signed a financing agreement to support  Moldova's vocational and education training system worth €35 million.
And I have congratulated Prime Minister @IurieLeanca on an important success – namely, the achievement of #visa liberalisation.
Moldovans are the 1st among over 175 million citizens in #EasternPartnership countries to travel to the EU without having to request a visa.
#Energy was also an important part of our discussions. Nobody in this region has an interest in using energy supplies as a political weapon.
